main.name: Chau Truong
main.description: I am dedicated to perfecting my craft by learning from others, remaining humble, and continuously improving my skills in web development. I’ve always had a sense of motivation and passion driving me forward
main.bio: As a Full Stack developer with strong preference to the back-end, I'm always looking for an opportunity to prove my skills and my ability. Before becoming a developer, I've always been excited about acquiring new skills and information, making things existing better for others and solving logic-problems. Whether it’s exploring unique opportunities, learning additional skills, or meeting new people, I bring these values to every experience throughout my life on a personal and professional level.
main.contactmessage: If you have any opportunities, questions about my work, or just want to get to know more about me, here is the place!

descriptions: Programming fundamentals and software development best practices.
Creating responsive and interactive web pages.
Server-side programming with Node.js, npm and the Express framework.
Retrieving, storing and updating databases using SQL.
Creating REST APIs to provide information and services.
Using the React front end framework to build complex user interfaces.
Calculus I, Calculus II and Calculus III used in various applied computer sciences.

work.title: Front-End Developer
descriptions: Developed a landing website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Created the User Interface of applications using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and React.
Developed and delivered my full-portfolio hosted on GitHub.

work.title: Cosmetologist
descriptions: Delivered exceptional customer service to all guests, building relationships with steady stable of 100+ loyal clients.
Maintained 98% positive customer comments average for 2 years.
Mastered the company’s full range of beauty products and services.

work.title: Mathematics Grader
descriptions: Graded homework assignments and tests, computed and recorded results.
Ensured software was installed properly on all computers in the Math lab.
Received 90%+ positive feedback from students and professors.

projects.title: Face Detection App
projects.category: A facial image recognition website that reads an image URL given by the user.
projects.content: MERN stack. Session management with authenticator routes. Hashed passwords securely. Redis for session management and caching. Detect human faces in pictures. Identify celebrities. Predict the age, gender, and culture appearance.

projects.title: Assignment Tracker
projects.category: An app to help users stay organized, keep track of things like assignments, due dates, and tests.
projects.content: MERN stack, including a RESTful API server. Users can register and sign in. This app helps users stay organized, keep track of things like assignments, due dates, and tests. Users can save assignments or delete assignments.
